data.title: The RimRiser
data.meta_description: SERIOUS SNARE UPGRADE FOR ANY DRUMMER! EACH 30 PLY ROCK MAPLE RIMRISER IS METICULOUSLY HANDCRAFTED IN THE U.S.A BY A SKILLED WOODWORKER WITH OVER THIRTY FIVE
data.text:
STEP UP YOUR DRUMMING The Rhythm of You

MEET THE RIMRISER FAMILY

30 Ply Maple

Handcrafted Rock Maple

Die Cast

Available in 6 Cool Colors

E RimRiser Hybrid

Digital Trigger w/ Endless Possibilities

MEET THE RIMRISER FAMILY

THE RIMRISER

30 PLY MAPLE

SERIOUS SNARE UPGRADE FOR ANY DRUMMER! EACH 30 PLY ROCK MAPLE RIMRISER IS METICULOUSLY HANDCRAFTED IN THE U.S.A BY A SKILLED WOODWORKER WITH OVER THIRTY FIVE YEARS EXPERIENCE IN SHELL DESIGN. COMPLIMENTING THE WARM WOOD MAPLE TONALITIES, A BRONZE STANDOFF SPACER AND SINGLE SIDED NEOPRENE/ STEEL WASHER EASILY ATTACHES WITH ONE TENSION ROD, COMPACTLY RAISING THE HOOP SURFACE ABOUT AN INCH ( EXTENDED DW TRUE PITCH AND STANDARD ROD IS INCLUDED WITH HARDWARE) ENHANCING THE MID RANGE AND CONTROL FOR A WARMER, MORE CONSISTENT CROSS STICK SOUND OR ADDING NEW WOODLIKE HOOP EFFECTS TO YOUR DRUMS .

30 PLY MAPLE SPECS

RRU1310MPL

Made in USA.

RimRiser is 5 3/4″ long, 3/4″ thick, and 1″ tall 30-ply maple.

1 x RimRiser 30 Ply Handcrafted Rock Maple

2 x Tension screws approx. 3 in. 7.32 (Standard) 5mm DW (True Pitch 50 thread (Available upon Request)

1 x Neoprene /Steel Flat washer

1 x. Bronze standoff

Fits multiple diameters of snare drums

THE RIMRISER

30 PLY MAPLE

SERIOUS SNARE UPGRADE FOR ANY DRUMMER! EACH 30 PLY ROCK MAPLE RIMRISER IS METICULOUSLY HANDCRAFTED IN THE U.S.A BY A SKILLED WOODWORKER WITH OVER THIRTY FIVE YEARS EXPERIENCE IN SHELL DESIGN. COMPLIMENTING THE WARM WOOD MAPLE TONALITIES, A BRONZE STANDOFF SPACER AND SINGLE SIDED NEOPRENE/ STEEL WASHER EASILY ATTACHES WITH ONE TENSION ROD, COMPACTLY RAISING THE HOOP SURFACE ABOUT AN INCH ( EXTENDED DW TRUE PITCH AND STANDARD ROD IS INCLUDED WITH HARDWARE) ENHANCING THE MID RANGE AND CONTROL FOR A WARMER, MORE CONSISTENT CROSS STICK SOUND OR ADDING NEW WOODLIKE HOOP EFFECTS TO YOUR DRUMS .

30 PLY MAPLE SPECS

RRU1310MPL

Made in USA.

RimRiser is 5 3/4″ long, 3/4″ thick, and 1″ tall 30-ply maple.

1 x RimRiser 30 Ply Handcrafted Rock Maple

2 x Tension screws approx. 3 in. 7.32 (Standard) 5mm DW (True Pitch 50 thread (Available upon Request)

1 x Neoprene /Steel Flat washer

1 x. Bronze standoff

Fits multiple diameters of snare drums

THE RIMRISER

E RIMRISER HYBRID

The E-RimRiser® is a digital trigger that allows acoustic drummers the freedom of virtual sounds, loops and effects without the clutter of drum pads and stands. E drummers can cross-stick for realistic play while creating new sound zones maximizing the space on their kit! Now there’s even more possibilities! !

This product is made for the drummer looking to add sound and flexability to their set. All in one place, you can have a wood block, cowbell, triangle, wind chime, anything you need but without all the space!

CHROME E-RIMRISER SPECS

Check back soon

THE RIMRISER

E RIMRISER HYBRID

The E-RimRiser® is a digital trigger that allows acoustic drummers the freedom of virtual sounds, loops and effects without the clutter of drum pads and stands. E drummers can cross-stick for realistic play while creating new sound zones maximizing the space on their kit! Now there’s even more possibilities! !

This product is made for the drummer looking to add sound and flexability to their set. All in one place, you can have a wood block, cowbell, triangle, wind chime, anything you need but without all the space!

CHROME E-RIMRISER SPECS

Check back soon

THE RIMRISER

DIE CAST

An easy rim add-on for more consistent cross-sticking.

The Rim Riser is a cross stick enhancer that allows you to get that perfect cross-stick sound every time, while offering the player a better grip on the stick. Cross-stick playing becomes easier and drummers are able to perform difficult patterns freely.

Great for all playing styles. Attaches easily.

DIE CAST RIMRISER SPECS

Features:

1 x RimRiser

2 x Tension screws

1 x Flat washer

1 x spacer

1 x Anti-vibration ring

DIECAST RIMRISER IS AVAILABLE IN 6 COLORS
